radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse bulky lymphadenopathy throughout the mediastinum and both hilar regions, fine reticular lung markings, evidence of previous granulomatous disease in the right middle lobe, enlarged heart, thyroid nodule, and ill-defined enlargement of the left adrenal gland.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Persistent bulky mediastinal lymphadenopathy was also present.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Prominent right hilum with a lobulated contour, extensive mediastinal and hilar lymphadenopathy, prominent interstitial markings and reticular opacities suggestive of pulmonary edema, and an increased cardiothoracic ratio indicative of cardiomegaly.
